attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Before it is final quit now rid ourselves of this mill-stone around our necks with its "Open Till" where  members are unaccountable, and unchecked fraud is rife . We have the WORLD to deal with ,currently higher Trade and Investment figures than the E.U . go back to increase Trading with , for instance our old Commonwealth& Dominions,the America's ,thus saving the enormous drain on our wealth
